General.Name: Inner Mongolia MengDian HuaNeng Thermal Power Corp Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Inner Mongolia MengDian HuaNeng Thermal Power Corporation Limited engages in thermal power generation business. The company is involved in wind power and solar power generation; photovoltaic power generation; coal resource mining and steam; and other renewable clean energy, as well as heating business. It also engages in the production and sale of coal, and coal mine machinery and equipment; and hot water supply and operation. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Hohhot, China. Inner Mongolia MengDian HuaNeng Thermal Power Corporation Limited operates as a subsidiary of North United Power Corporation.
General.Address: Power Science and Technology Building, Hohhot, China
